{{Infobox Software | name = DirectAdmin | screenshot = | caption = | author = JBMC Software | developer = JBMC Software | released = | latest release version = 1.4 | latest release date = November 24, 2011 | latest preview version = | latest preview date = | operating system = [[Linux]], [[BSD]] | platform = | language = English | genre = [[Control Panel]] | license = [[Proprietary software|Proprietary]] | website = http://www.directadmin.com }} '''DirectAdmin''' is a graphical web-based [[Control panel (Web hosting)|web hosting control panel]] designed to make administration of [[website]]s easier. == System requirements == DirectAdmin is compatible with several versions of [[Red Hat Linux|Red Hat]], [[Fedora (Linux distribution)|Fedora Core]], [[Red Hat Enterprise Linux]], [[CentOS]], [[FreeBSD]], [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] and [[Debian]].{{cite web|url=http://www.directadmin.com/install.html|title=system requirements page of directadmin.com|accessdate=2008-02-02}} The following specifications are recommended:
Processor: 500 MHz
Memory: 512 MB
HDD Space: minimal 2 GB free space DirectAdmin is often called DA for short ==See also== * [[Installatron]] * [[Baifox]] * [[cPanel]] * [[Domain Technologie Control]] * [[Hosting Controller]] * [[ISPConfig]] * [[Kloxo]] * [[SysCP]] * [[Webmin]] * [[NeHoX]] == References == == External links == * [http://www.directadmin.com Official website] * [http://help.directadmin.com DirectAdmin knowledge base] * [http://www.directadmin.com/forum Official forum] {{WebManTools}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Directadmin}} [[Category:Web server management software]] {{web-software-stub}} [[fa:Ø¯Ø§ÛØ±Ú©Øª Ø§Ø¯ÙÛÙ]] [[ru:DirectAdmin]]
